summary: Adds an argonian blacksmith which can be a follower
descriptionHtml:
This is my 2nd mod being published
please enjoy!



Info-
Alvor was tired of getting his ass kicked when dragons or dragonborn goes on a rampage
so now he has a new bodyguard/buddy

his name is Alvor`k a argonian trained to protect
he is also a smithing master secretly
if riverwood or alvor is harmed he rushes toward the threat and attacks them

he is also a follower



bugs-

-when alvor or alvor`k dies and they will be stuck on a eternal loop about yeilding to you occasionaly
-alvor`k is suicidal
-Alvor`k wont offer smithing training
author: MGtheBAdAZz
